title: The Little Prince In The Next Life
alternative_title: The Little Prince in the Next Life ; The Little Prince Reincarnate ; 다음 생에도 어린왕자
status: The Little Prince in the Next Life ; The Little Prince Reincarnate ; 다음 생에도 어린왕자
description:
Description :
        Reincarnated as a mixed-race high school girl, Lee Ah-rin finds herself in a complicated situation. After suffering from bullying trauma, she tries to avoid getting close to others. However, she becomes entangled with the charming and beloved Rose Hwan, who has a rebellious side. As she interacts more with them, memories of her past life begin to resurface. This story unfolds a love triangle between the Little Prince, a fox, and a rose in a school setting!
